title: The Children's Bath
provenance: From the Collection of Leo Wallerstein; William Esdaile (Lugt 2617)
medium: Engraving on off white laid paper
description: Two children stand in a large wooden tub of water surrounded by four children who play outside the tub.  At the right, a nude woman, seated on a gothic-style bench, bathes another child who is lying across her lap.
name: Print
